text: Syd Little (born Cyril John Mead on 19 December 1942) is an English comedian. He is known for his work with Eddie Large in the double act Little and Large. In 2015, Little took part in BBC One's Celebrity MasterChef and made it through to the third round. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:English television personalities Category:People from Blackpool
title: Syd Little
